comment.author: 91829349@N00
comment._content:
Looks like Christy Mathewson in the sweater.  The faint scrawl on the right side says "Matty," I think.

Notice the color of the ball.

comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: Other picture of the same scene, identifying Tesreau and Mathewson (musicians on field and "Matty" in script on negative as well): Could be the 1912 or 1913 World Series

comment.author: 34904489@N07
comment._content:
artolog :

Thanks for your good observations on the details of this image, and for connecting it to the other similar photo, so we can add the identification of Christy Mathewson to this one.
